mapper.select: SELECT d.auths FROM sys_user_security a LEFT JOIN sys_role_ref_user b ON b.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_ref_menu c ON c.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu d ON d.id = c.menu_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.enable_flag = TRUE AND d.enable_flag = TRUE AND d.auths != ''
